LeadDailyMetric.name: LeadDailyMetric
LeadDailyMetric.description: Represents the daily engagement metrics for a lead.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with the call result Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with the call result Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with the call result Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with the call result Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with no call result specified.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls in the day for this lead with the call result Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total of hard and soft bounced emails for this lead in the day.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of successfully delivered emails for this lead in the day.

AllEmailsDeliveredRate.description: The percentage of tracked emails sent that were successfully delivered to this lead. This field is a calculated field.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of hard bounced emails for this lead in the day.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that triggered an out of office reply for this lead in the day.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead in the day.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails soft bounced for this lead in the day.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with engagement tracking enabled in the day.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead without engagement tracking enabled in the day.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The total number of calls to this lead with all call results in the day.

DailyCutOffTimeStamp.description: The time of day when each 24-hour metrics period starts and ends.

Date.description: The date on which the engagement occurred.

DateInt.description: The date on which the engagement occurred, in yyyymmdd format.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with hard bounce tracking.

InboundEngagementsCount.description: The number of inbound engagements for this lead in the day. This field is a calculated field. The value is the sum of UniqueEmailsOpenedCount, UniqueEmailsRepliedCount, and UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.

LeadId.description: The ID of the related lead.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with link click tracking.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with open tracking.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with out-of-office tracking.

OutboundEngagementsCount.description: The number of outbound engagements for this lead in the day. This field is a calculated field. The value is the sum of AllTotalCallsCount and AllEmailsDeliveredCount.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with reply tracking.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with soft bounce tracking.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with link tracking that had link clicks. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with open tracking that were opened by the recipient. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with reply tracking that received replies. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with soft bounce tracking that soft bounced. This field is a calculated field.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of individual emails in which the lead clicked a link in the day.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of individual emails opened by the lead in the day.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of individual emails replied to by the lead in the day.
